function.name: create_task
function.description: Create a new task in the Todozi system with automatic AI assignment and queue management. Use this when users mention tasks, todos, or things they need to do.

action.description: Task description/action to perform. Be specific and actionable.
examples: Fix login bug in mobile app
Design database schema for e-commerce platform

time.description: Time estimate (e.g., '2 hours', '1 day', '1 week'). Optional but helpful for planning.

priority.description: Priority level. Use 'urgent' or 'critical' for time-sensitive issues.

project.description: Project name for organization. Use existing projects or create new ones.

assignee.description: Who should handle this task. 'ai' for AI processing, 'human' for manual work, 'collaborative' for both.

tags.description: Comma-separated tags for categorization and search.

context.description: Additional context, requirements, or background information.
examples: This task requires knowledge of React and TypeScript
Must follow our existing design system
Coordinate with the backend team for API changes

examples.description: Create a high-priority task for AI processing

example.context: Must integrate with existing user management system

examples.description: Create a collaborative task for human-AI work

example.context: Should match our brand guidelines and be mobile-responsive
